director.name: Pablo Silva González Pablo Silva González

introduction: Anaís, Carla, Darío, and Ángel dive into a night of excesses, drugs, alcohol, and sex to escape their traumas, inspired by the nihilistic undertones of a decaying society. As the night progresses, their lives spiral into a whirlwind of hedonism and self-destruction, exposing the harsh reality of their existence and the emptiness that lies beneath their pursuits.
